name: Wilson Richards
text:
Reduce en 1 el coste de recursos del primer Apoyo [[Herramienta]] que juegues en cada ronda.
Recibes +1 a tu valor de habilidad durante las pruebas de habilidad de Apoyos [[Herramienta]].
Efecto [elder_sign]: +0. Puedes intercambiar un Apoyo [[Herramienta]] que esté en tu zona de juego con un Apoyo [[Herramienta]] que esté en tu mano y tenga un coste impreso igual o menor.
back_flavor: Wilson se enorgullece de tener siempre la herramienta justa para el trabajo. ¿Cañerías que gotean? Llave inglesa. ¿Árbol caído? Sierra de mano. ¿Reforma interior? Almádena. Sin embargo, los trabajos que ha tenido en Arkham y alrededores últimamente han tomado un cierto cariz extraño. Suelos de madera que crujen y se abren a túneles laberínticos. Un tejado roto que muestra señales de explotar hacia fuera en lugar de colapsar hacia dentro. El trabajo de Wilson es arreglar los problemas, y cuando esos problemas incluyen criaturas extrañas y horripilantes y fenómenos inexplicables, es hora de aplicar la creatividad a los útiles que dispone.
back_text: Tamaño de mazo: 30. Opciones de creación de mazos: Cartas de [[Herramienta]] de nivel 0-5, Cartas Guardián ([guardian]) de nivel 0-4, cartas neutrales de nivel 0-5, hasta otras 5 cartas [[Improvisado]] y/o [[Mejora]] de nivel 0-1. Requisitos de creación de mazos (no cuentan para el tamaño de mazo): Ad Hoc, Arreglo apresurado, 1 Debilidad básica aleatoria.

flavor: "Menudo trabajito."
name: Ad Hoc
text:
Sólo para el mazo de Wilson Richards.
Vincula Ad hoc a un apoyo [[Herramienta]] o [[Arma]] que controles.
[reaction] Después de resolver una capacidad [action] del Apoyo vinculado, agota Ad Hoc y descarta un Apoyo [[Herramienta]] o [[Arma]] de tu mano: Resuelve una capacidad [action] del Apoyo descartado, ignorando todos los costes.

name: Arreglo apresurado
text: Revelación - Pon Arreglo apresurado en juego en tu zona de amenaza. Al activar capacidades de Apoyos que controles, fija el valor básico de tu habilidad en 0. [action] [action]: Descarta Arreglo apresurado.

name: Kate Winthrop
text: Comienzas la partida con el Estabilizador de flujo (Inactivo) boca arriba. [fast]: Mueve 1 pista de Kate Winthrop a un Apoyo [[Ciencia]] o [[Herramienta]] que controles y que no tenga pistas. Obligado - Cuando un Apoyo que controles y que tenga una pista abandone el juego: Coloca su pista en tu Lugar. Efecto [elder_sign]: +0. Puedes mover 1 pista de un Apoyo que controles de vuelta a Kate Winthrop.
back_flavor: Kate Winthrop se ha pasado años investigando en el sótano del edificio de Ciencias de la Universidad de Miskatonic, renunciando a la financiación y al prestigio académico en pos del progreso. Su decidida concentración por fin tuvo fruto con la invención del estabilizador de flujo, un potente dispositivo capaz de canalizar una nueva forma de energía. Sin embargo, el precio del progreso es elevado. La primera prueba con éxito de este innovador invento se cobró la vida de su amigo y mentor, el profesor Young. Desde entonces, Kate ha trabajado de forma incansable para entender estas corrientes alienígenas, con la esperanza de lograr encontrar algún modo de revertir sus efectos.
back_text: Tamaño de mazo: 30. Opciones de creación de mazos: Cartas Buscador ([seeker]) de nivel 0-5, cartas [[Ciencia]] de nivel 0-4, cartas [[Inspiración]] de nivel 0-1, cartas neutrales de nivel 0-5. Requisitos de creación de mazos (no cuentan para el tamaño de mazo): Estabilizador de flujo, Experimento fallido, 1 Debilidad básica aleatoria.

name: Estabilizador de flujo
text: Permanente. Sólo para el mazo de Kate Winthrop. Obligado - Después de que se coloque una pista en el Estabilizador de flujo: Busca entre tus cartas enlazadas o en tu pila de descartes 1 copia de Corriente etérica, añádela a tu mazo y baraja éste. Dale la vuelta al Estabilizador de flujo (conservando todas las fichas y cartas vinculadas).

flavor: ¿Se trata de la misma energía que emplea Nikola Tesla?
name: Estabilizador de flujo
text:
Permanente. Sólo para el mazo de Kate Winthrop
[reaction] Cuando coloques una pista en un Apoyo que controles: recibes +2 a tu valor de habilidad para tu siguiente prueba de habilidad en esta fase.

name: Corriente etérica
text: Enlazada (Estabilizador de flujo). Juega esta carta sólo si el Estabilizador de flujo está en su lado (Activo). Combatir. Mueve todas las pistas de Apoyos que controles a Kate Winthrop. Para este ataque, puedes usar [intellect] en lugar de [combat]. Si tienes éxito y el Enemigo atacado no es [[Élite]], puedes agotarlo y moverlo a cualquier Lugar. Roba 1 carta. Dale la vuelta al Estabilizador de flujo (conservando todas las fichas y cartas vinculadas).

name: Corriente etérica
text: Enlazada (Estabilizador de flujo). Juega esta carta sólo si el Estabilizador de flujo está en su lado (Activo). Evitar. Mueve todas las pistas de Apoyos que controles a Kate Winthrop. Para este intento de evitar, puedes usar [intellect] en lugar de [agility]. Si tienes éxito y el objetivo de este intento de evitar no es [[Élite]], añádelo al mazo de Encuentros y baraja éste. Roba 1 carta. Dale la vuelta al Estabilizador de flujo (conservando todas las fichas y cartas vinculadas).

flavor: "He cometido un enorme error."
name: Experimento fallido
text: Revelación - Realiza una prueba de [willpower] (3). Esta prueba recibe +1 a su dificultad por cada Apoyo que controles que tenga una pista. Por cada punto que te falte para tener éxito, debes recibir 1 punto de horror o colocar 1 de tus pistas en tu Lugar.

name: Alessandra Zorzi
flavor: "Me encanta una buena fiesta."
text:
Puedes realizar una acción adicional durante tu turno, pero sólo para negociar.
Efecto [elder_sign]: +2. Si tienes éxito, elige un Enemigo que no sea [[Élite]] y que esté en tu Lugar o en un Lugar conectado o revelado. Evita automáticamente a ese Enemigo.
back_flavor: La despreocupada vida de lujos de Alessandra le permite pasar de una elegante gala en Nueva York a un banquete con el maharajá de la India con total facilidad. La condesa ha probado todos los platos, bebidas y damas de Marrakech a Chicago. Sin embargo, el título nobiliario es pura fachada, porque entre bambalinas emplea su tapadera para saquear galerías de arte, bancos y los corazones y carteras de los ricos y frívolos. Su pico de oro la ha metido en tantos problemas como la ha sacado de ellos. Un trabajito con el turbio Zamacona ha traído a Alessandra a Arkham, Massachusetts, donde la condesa ha descubierto que tras los sugestionables ricos y frívolos excesos se oculta mucho más de lo que pensaba.
back_text: Tamaño de mazo: 30. Opciones de creación de mazos: Cartas Rebelde ([rogue]) de nivel 0-5, cartas con "Negociar" de nivel 0-5, cartas neutrales de nivel 0-5. Requisitos de creación de mazos (no cuentan para el tamaño de mazo): 3 copias de Cautivar, Zamacona, 1 Debilidad básica aleatoria.

name: Cautivar
text: Solo para el mazo de Alessandra Zorzi. Rápido. Juega esta carta sólo durante tu turno. Vincula Cautivar a un Enemigo que no sea [[Élite]] que esté en tu localización. [action]: Negociar. Mueve el Enemigo vinculado a un Lugar conectado revelado o bien realiza una acción básica de investigar o evitar en su Lugar. Si fracasas en una prueba de habilidad mientras resuelves esta capacidad, descarta Cautivar. Puedes activar esta capacidad desde cualquier Lugar.

name: Zamacona
text: Escurridizo. Aparición - Lugar vacío más cercano si es posible. Alessandra Zorzi no puede negociar con Zamacona. Obligado - La primera vez que Alessandra Zorzi negocie en cada ronda: Coloca 1 ficha de Perdición en Zamacona.

name: Kōhaku Narukami
text: [reaction] Al comienzo de tu turno: Añade 1 ficha [bless] o 1 ficha [curse] a la bolsa del caos, de lo que haya menos (en caso de empate, eliges tú), o bien quita 2 fichas [bless] y 2 fichas [curse] de la bolsa de caos para realizar una acción adicional este turno. Efecto [elder_sign]: +2. Añade 1 ficha [bless] y 1 ficha [curse] a la bolsa del caos.
flavor: "¿Por qué no recibimos lo desconocido con asombro en lugar de miedo?"
back_flavor: No hay nadie en la Sociedad Histórica de Arkham que no reconozca la estentórea risa de Kōhaku y los aterradores relatos que cuenta tanto sobre los yōkai de su hogar de infancia a las afueras de Tokio como sobre las extrañas criaturas que moran en los Bosques de Arkham. El excéntrico folclorista afirma delante de todo el mundo que el registro y publicación de la existencia de estos fenómenos será su mayor obra. Sólo cuando está en casa con Gabriel, su pareja, oye los lloros del mismo espíritu que se le aparecía a su padre y teme que su "mayor obra" nunca le permita dormir una sola noche.
back_text: Tamaño de mazo: 30. Opciones de creación de mazos: Cartas [[Bendecido]] de nivel 0-5, Cartas [[Maldito]] de nivel 0-5, cartas [[Ocultismo]] de nivel 0, cartas Místico ([mystic]) de nivel 0-3, cartas neutrales de nivel 0-5. Requisitos de creación de mazos (no cuentan para el tamaño de mazo): Libro de los Mitos Vivientes, Yurei plañidera, 1 Debilidad básica aleatoria.

name: Libro de los Mitos Vivientes
text: Sólo para el mazo de Kōhaku Narukami. [reaction] Cuando fuese a ser revelada una ficha de Caos en tu Lugar, agota el Libro de los Mitos Vivientes: Busca en la bolsa de caos una ficha [bless] o [curse], de lo que haya más (en caso de empate, eliges tú), y resuélvela en su lugar.

name: Yurei plañidera
text: Indiferente. Escurridizo. Cazador. Presa - Sólo Kōhaku Narukami. Obligado - Después de que un investigador revele una ficha de [bless] o [curse] durante una prueba de habilidad en el Lugar de la Yurei plañidera, si ésta está preparada: La Yurei plañidera ataca a ese investigador. Límite de una vez por prueba.

name: Hank Samson
text:
Se te puede asignar daño/horror infligido a Apoyos [[Aliado]] o a otros investigadores que estén en tu lugar.
[reaction] Cuando fueses a ser derrotado por daño y/u horror: En vez de eso, cúrate todo el daño y horror e intercambia esta carta con su versión [[Decidido]] enlazada, con cualquier lado boca arriba.
Efecto [elder_sign]: +1.
back_flavor: Hank Samson creció en una granja encargándose de todas las tareas que le mandaban a su padre y su madre, lo que incluía cuidar de sus hermanos y hermanas. Cuando padre le mostró los extraños animales del corral de la ciudad, Hank se sintió incómodo, pero hizo lo que le decía. Cuando padre le dijo que esperase, él esperó. Y cuando padre no volvió, Hank fue a buscarlo. Padre le enseñó que la famila lo es todo y que a la familia no se la abandona.
back_text: Tamaño de mazo: 35. Opciones de creación de mazos: Cartas de superviviente ([survivor]) de nivel 0-5, cartas neutrales de nivel 0-5, hasta 10 otras cartas [[Innato]] y/o [[Espíritu]] de nivel 0-2. Requisitos de creación de mazos (no cuentan para el tamaño de mazo): Fuerte de corazón, "¿Dónde está Padre?", 1 Debilidad básica aleatoria.

name: Hank Samson
text:
Enlazada (Hank Samson).
No se te puede curar. Se te puede asignar daño/horror infligido a Apoyos [[Aliado]] o a otros investigadores que estén en tu Lugar.
[reaction] Cuando se te coloquen 1 o más puntos de horror: Roba 1 carta.
Efecto [elder_sign]: +1. Mueve 1 punto de horror de Hank Samson a un Apoyo que controles.

name: Hank Samson
text:
Enlazada (Hank Samson).
No se te puede curar. Se te puede asignar daño/horror infligido a Apoyos [[Aliado]] o a otros investigadores que estén en tu Lugar.
[reaction] Cuando se te coloquen 1 o más puntos de daño: Obtén 2 recursos.
Efecto [elder_sign]: +1. Mueve 1 punto de daño de Hank Samson a un Apoyo que controles.

flavor: Todo el mundo es un héroe para alguien.
name: Fuerte de corazón
text:
Sólo para el mazo de Hank Samson.
Rápido. Juega esta carta cuando te enfrentes a un Enemigo que no sea [[Élite]].
Mueve hasta 2 puntos de daño y/u horror de Hank Samson a ese Enemigo, como daño.

name: "¿Dónde está Padre?"
text: Revelación - Descarta cartas de la parte superior del mazo de encuentros hasta que sea descartado un Enemigo. Vincula "¿Dónde está Padre?" a ese Enemigo y haz que aparezca en un Lugar conectado si es posible. . El enemigo vinculado obtiene Escurridizo. Obligado - Al final de la ronda: Hank Samson recibe 1 punto de horror directo.

flavor: Never forget those who came before.
name: Ancestral Token
text: [reaction] After you defeat an enemy, exhaust Ancestral Token: Add [bless] tokens to the chaos bag equal to that enemy's printed health (max 5).

flavor:
"It cleans! It fixes! It picks, plucks, shines, and swishes!"
-Schoffner's Catalogue, Winter 1924 ed.
name: Cleaning Kit
text:
Uses (3 supplies).
Supplies on Cleaning Kit may be spent as if they were supplies or ammo on assets you control.

name: Katana
text: [action]: Fight. You get +2 [combat] for this test. If you succeed by exactly 2, you may exhaust Katana to deal +2 damage for this attack. [fast]Exhaust Katana: Fight. Use [agility] instead of [combat] for this attack.

name: Ofuda
text:
Uses (1 charge). Replenish this charge the first time a [bless] token is revealed at your location each round.
[fast] Choose a non-[[Élite]] enemy at your location and spend 1 charge: That enemy loses the alert, aloof, elusive, and retaliate keywords until the end of the round.

name: Wolf Mask
text:
Limit 1 [[Máscara]] per investigator.
Uses (2 offerings). Replenish 1 of these offerings after you engage an enemy.
[fast] Spend 1 offering: You get +2 [combat] or +2 [agility] for this skill test. (Limit once per test.)

name: Absolution
text:
Reveal 3 random tokens from the chaos bag, along with X additional tokens.
For each non-symbol token revealed, add 1 [bless] token to the chaos bag. For each [bless] token revealed, heal 1 horror from an investigator or [[Aliado]] asset at your location.

name: Guided by Faith
text: Investigate. You may use [willpower] instead of [intellect] for this investigation. Before revealing chaos tokens for this test, add 2 [bless] tokens to the chaos bag. If a [bless] or [elder_sign] token is revealed during this skill test, discover 1 additional clue at your location.

flavor: "H-hands where I can see 'em!"
name: Hold Up
text: Parley. Choose an enemy at your location and an [[Item]] asset in your hand. Perform a fight action against the chosen enemy. If you succeed, instead of dealing damage, play the chosen asset, reducing its cost by each point you succeeded by.

name: Task Force
text:
As an additional cost to play Task Force, spend an action. One at a time, in any order, choose an investigator at your location to...
- ...resolve an [action] ability on an asset they control without paying its [action] cost.
- ...move to a connecting location.
- ...discover 1 clue at their location.

flavor: "You still call that a wrench?!"
name: Tinker
text:
Fast. Play only during your turn.
Attach Tinker to a [[Herramienta]] asset in your play area. Limit 1 per asset.
Attached asset takes up 1 fewer hand or accessory slot.

name: Purified
text:
Max 1 committed per skill test.
You may commit Purified to any type of test.
If this test is successful, for each point you succeeded by (to a maximum of 5), add 1 [bless] token or remove 1 [curse] token from the chaos bag.

flavor: Keep your eyes on the target.
name: Hand-Eye Coordination
text:
Fast. Play only during your turn.
Resolve an [action] ability on a [[Herramienta]] or [[Weapon]] asset you control without paying its [action] cost.

name: Strong-Armed
text: While Strong-Armed is committed to an attack using a [[Melee]] or [[Ranged]] asset, this attack deals +1 damage. After revealing chaos token(s) for this skill test, you may take 1 damage to cancel that chaos token, return it to the chaos bag, and reveal a new one. (You may do this any number of times.)

name: Second Wind
text:
Play only as your first action.
Heal 2 damage (3 instead if you drew a treachery this round). Draw 1 card.

name: Cleaning Kit
text:
Uses (4 supplies).
Supplies on Cleaning Kit may be spent as if they were supplies or ammo on assets you control.
[reaction] When a supply is spent from Cleaning Kit, exhaust it: The performing investigator gets +2 skill value for this test.

name: Blessed Blade
text: [action]: Fight. You get +2 [combat] for this attack. If this attack is successful, it deals +1 damage. Return each [bless] token revealed during this attack to the chaos bag. Before revealing chaos token(s) for this attack, you may exhaust Blessed Blade to add 2 [bless] tokens to the chaos bag.

name: Eyes of Valusia
text: [action]: Parley. Choose an enemy at your location. Until the end of the round, each investigator gets +1 skill value while fighting, evading, or parleying with the chosen enemy. Place 1 resource on Eyes of Valusia, as a charge. [fast]: Search your bonded cards for Blade of Yoth and swap it with Eyes of Valusia, moving all charges from Eyes of Valusia to Blade of Yoth.

name: Blade of Yoth
text: Bonded (Eyes of Valusia). [action] Spend 1-3 charges: Fight. For this attack, you may use [willpower] instead of [combat]. You get +2 skill value and deal +1 damage for each charge spent as part of this action's cost. [fast]: Search your bonded cards for Eyes of Valusia and swap it with Blade of Yoth, discarding all charges.

name: Flurry of Blows
text: Play only if you control a [[Melee]] asset. As an additional cost to play Flurry of Blows, spend an action. Fight. Choose a [[Melee]] asset you control and take an immediate fight action with that asset (without paying its [action] cost). You may repeat this effect up to three times. After the final attack resolves, if it is your turn, end your turn.

name: Miracle Wish
text:
Fast. Play after 1 or more [bless] tokens are revealed during a skill test at your location.
Search your bonded cards for Evanescent Ascension and put it into play. Place up to X resources on it, as wishes (to a maximum of the number of [bless] tokens revealed). Remove Miracle Wish from the game.

name: Evanescent Ascension
text: Bonded (Miracle Wish). If Evanescent Ascension has no wishes, set it aside, out of play. [reaction] When an investigator at your location would fail a skill test, spend 1 wish and exhaust Evanescent Ascension: Resolve that investigator's [elder_sign] effect (in addition to all other tokens revealed during this test).

name: Chemistry Set
text: [action] Exhaust Chemistry Set: Investigate. If you... - ...fail by exactly 2, discard Chemistry Set. - ...succeed by exactly 0, gain 2 resources. - ...succeed by exactly 2, draw 1 card. - ...succeed by exactly 4, discover 1 additional clue at your location.

name: Dr. Charles West III
text:
You have 1 additional hand slot, which can only be used to hold a [[Herramienta]] asset.
[reaction] After you successfully investigate by exactly 1 or 3, exhaust Dr. Charles West III: Deal 1 damage to an enemy at your location.

name: Microscope
text: [reaction] After an enemy at your location is successfully evaded or defeated, exhaust Microscope: Place 1 resource on Microscope, as evidence. [action] [action]: Investigate. You get +1 [intellect] for this investigation for each evidence on Microscope (max +3 [intellect]). If you succeed, you may spend up to 2 evidence to discover that many additional clues at your location.

name: Mouse Mask
text:
Limit 1 [[Mask]] per investigator.
Uses (2 offerings). Replenish 1 of these offerings after you reveal a location or put a new location into play.
[fast] Spend 1 offering: You get +2 [willpower] or +2 [intellect] for this skill test. (Limit once per test.)

name: Ravenous Myconid
text:
Limit 1 per deck.
[action]: Search your bonded cards for Uncanny Growth and add it to your hand.
[action] If Ravenous Myconid has 3 or more growth on it: Move each growth to your resource pool, as resources. Record in your Campaign Log that "you have classified a new species."

name: Uncanny Growth
text: Bonded (Ravenous Myconid). Investigate. After this test resolves, place 1 resource on Ravenous Myconid, as growth, for each point you succeed by. Set Uncanny Growth aside, out of play. If you fail, return Uncanny Growth to your hand.

flavor: "There was a solution which he injected into the veins of dead things, and if they were fresh enough they responded in strange ways." -H.P. Lovecraft, Herbert West - Reanimator
name: Control Variable
text:
Fast. Play after an investigator reveals a h token during a skill test at your location.
Discover 1 clue at your location.

name: Testing Sprint
text: As an additional cost to play Testing Sprint, spend an action. Investigate. One at a time, investigate your location and each connecting location once each in ascending order of shroud, until you either fail to investigate or successfully investigate each eligible location.

flavor: The truth is often hidden in plain sight.
name: Thorough Inquiry
text: As an additional cost to play Thorough Inquiry, spend an action. Investigators at your location draw a combined total of 5 cards (you decide how many cards each investigator draws).

flavor: "Kid, you... you took that a lot more literally than I expected you to."
name: "Throw the Book at Them!"
text: Fight. Choose a [[Tome]] asset you control. You get +X [combat] for this attack, where X is that asset's printed cost. If you succeed, you may either automatically evade the attacked enemy, or after the attack ends, you may resolve an [action] or [fast] ability on the chosen asset (ignoring its [action] cost, if any).

flavor: "I said 'blow it up,' not '<u>blow</u> it up!"
name: Transmogrify
text: Evade. You may use [intellect] instead of [agility] for this evasion attempt. If you succeed and the enemy is non-[[Élite]], attach Transmogrify to it. Attached enemy gains: "Massive. Cannot move. [reaction] After you evade this enemy: Discover 1 clue at its location. (Limit once per round.)"

flavor: Every cent of that research grant counts.
name: Well-Funded
text: While you control a [[Science]] or [[Herramienta]] asset, Well-Funded gains [wild] (while you control 3 or more [[Science]] and/or [[Herramienta]] assets, Well-Funded gains [wild] [wild], instead).

flavor: "Helping you is easier than teaching my students geometry."
name: Gabriel Carillo
text:
You get +1 [intellect].
[reaction] At the start of your turn, add 1 [curse] token to the chaos bag: Draw 1 card.

flavor: A nick can be the difference between life and death.
name: Steady-Handed
text:
Limit 1 per investigator.
[reaction] When you would succeed at a skill test, exhaust Steady-Handed: You either succeed by 1 more or 1 less. If you succeeded by exactly 2, heal 1 horror.

flavor: "I assure you there's nothing to fear!"
name: Fine Tuning
text:
Attach to a [[Herramienta]] or [[Science]] asset you control. Limit 1 per asset.
[reaction] After attached asset exhausts, exhaust Fine Tuning: Ready attached asset.

flavor: Rumor has it the university's last phrenology professor enjoyed an unnaturally long tenure.
name: Esoteric Method
text: After this skill test ends, add 1 [curse] token to the chaos bag for each point the performing investigator either succeeded or failed by.

name: Prismatic Spectacles
text: [action] Add 1 [curse] token to the chaos bag: Investigate. You get +2 skill value for this investigation. If a [curse] token is revealed during this investigation, you may exhaust Prismatic Spectacles to discover 1 additional clue at your location.

flavor: "It'll never work, Herbert."
name: Confound
text: Parley. Choose an enemy at your location. Test [intellect] (X), where X is the chosen enemy's evade value. If you succeed, discover 2 clues at your location. Then, if the chosen enemy is non-[[Élite]], automatically evade it. It does not ready during the next upkeep phase.

name: Microscope
text: [reaction] After an enemy at your location is successfully evaded or defeated: Place 1 resource on Microscope, as evidence. [action] [action]: Investigate. You get +2 [intellect] for this investigation for each evidence on Microscope (max +6 [intellect]). If you succeed, you may spend up to 3 evidence to discover that many additional clues at your location.

name: Ravenous Myconid
text:
Researched. Limit 1 per deck.
[fast]: Search your bonded cards for Uncanny Growth and add it to your hand. (Limit once per round.)
[reaction] When an investigator draws a non-weakness treachery card, it their locations shroud is equal to or less than Ravenous Myconid's growth: Cancel that treachery's effects and discard it. Remove all growth from Ravenous Myconid.

name: Ravenous Myconid
text:
Researched. Limit 1 per deck.
[fast]: Search your bonded cards for Uncanny Growth and add it to your hand. (Limit once per round.)
[fast] Choose a non-[[Élite]] enemy at your location with equal or fewer remaining health than the amount of growth on Ravenous Myconid: Defeat that enemy. Remove all growth from Ravenous Myconid.

name: Ravenous Myconid
text:
Researched. Limit 1 per deck.
[fast]: Search your bonded cards for Uncanny Growth and add it to your hand. (Limit once per round.)
[fast] Remove all growth from Ravenous Myconid: Either heal that much damage/horror from Ravenous Myconid, or move that much damage/horror from investigators or Ally assets at your location to Ravenous Myconid.

name: Bianca "Die Katz"
text: Limit 1 per deck. Uses (10 resources). [action] Exhaust Bianca "Die Katz": Parley. Move X resources from Bianca "Die Katz" to your resource pool. X cannot be more than 5. Test [agility] (X). If you fail, remember "you owe Bianca X resources." Then, search your bonded cards for the Bianca "Die Katz" enemy and spawn her at your location. Remove this card from the game.

name: Bianca "Die Katz"
text: Bonded (Bianca "Die Katz"). Hunter. Prey - Bearer only. [action] If "you owe Bianca X resources," spend X resources: Parley. Add Bianca "Die Katz" to the victory display. Forced - When Bianca "Die Katz" leaves play (except by the above ability: Shuffle her into your deck.

name: Blackmail File
text: [action] Choose a non-[[Élite]] enemy at your location: Parley. Test [willpower] (X), where X is that enemy's printed health value. If you succeed, that enemy disengages from each investigator and gains aloof until the end of the round.

name: British Bull Dog
text: Uses (3 ammo). [action] Spend 1 ammo: Fight. You may use [agility] instead of [combat], for this attack. This attack deals +1 damage. [reaction] After you fail a skill test while parleying with an enemy: Put British Bull Dog into play from your hand.

name: Fake Credentials
text: [action] Choose an enemy at your location and exhaust Fake Credentials: Parley. Test [intellect] (1). This test gets +1 difficulty for each suspicion on Fake Credentials. If you succeed, discover 1 clue at your location and place 1 resource on Fake Credentials, as suspicion. If you fail, you must either discard Fake Credentials, or the chosen enemy attacks you.

name: Fox Mask
text:
Limit 1 [[Mask]] per investigator.
Uses (2 offerings). Replenish 1 of these offerings after you move out of a location with an enemy.
[fast] Spend 1 offering: You get +2 [intellect] or +2 [agility] for this skill test. (Limit once per test.)

flavor: "Let faith oust fact; let fancy oust memory; I look deep down and do believe." - Herman Melville, <u>Moby-Dick</u>
name: Scrimshaw Charm
text: [action] Add 1-3 [curse] tokens to the chaos bag and exhaust Scrimshaw Charm: Gain 1 resource. For each token added, gain 1 additional resource.

flavor:
"No names, Skids."
"Sorry, Finn."
name: Bank Job
text:
As an additional cost to play Bank Job, spend an action.
Investigators at your location gain a total of 8 resources, distributed as you wish.

flavor: "You'd have made a pretty good cowboy."
name: False Surrender
text: Parley. Choose an enemy at your location and play a [[Weapon]] asset from your hand, reducing its cost by 1. You may then take a fight action with that weapon against the chosen enemy, using [agility] instead of the skill indicated.

flavor:
"Look! A dumb bird!"
"I don't see a bird."
"I do."
name: Grift
text: Parley. Choose an enemy at your location and test [agility] (0). For each point you succeed by, gain 1 resource (to a maximum of 6). If you fail, that enemy attacks you.

name: "I'll Pay You Back!"
text:
Fast. Play only during your turn.
Choose an investigator at your location. Move all resources from that investigator's resource pool to your resource pool. At the end of the round, move all resources from your resource pool to that investigator's resource pool.

flavor: "He did say something about your hair..."
name: Stir the Pot
text: Parley. Choose an enemy at your location and test [intellect] (X), where X is the chosen enemy's combined damage and horror values. If you succeed, deal 2 damage to each enemy at your location. If you succeed by 2 or more, after this effect resolves you may disengage from each enemy and move to a connecting location.

name: Vamp
text: Parley. Choose an enemy at your location and test any skill (3). If you succeed and you tested... - ...[willpower], remove 1 doom from that enemy. - ...[intellect], discover 1 clue at your location. - ...[agility], automatically evade that enemy. If it is non-[[Élite]], move it to a connecting location. - ...[combat], deal 2 damage to that enemy.

flavor: "Shoggoths. Why did it have to be shoggoths?"
name: Diabolical Luck
text: When you reveal a [curse] token during a skill test you are performing, you may commit Diabolical Luck to that skill test from your hand. If you do, Diabolical Luck gains [wild][wild][wild].

flavor: "I never ran from anything like that devil tonight, though. Hope I never have to again." -Rita Young, Investigators of Arkham Horror
name: Lightfooted
text: If this skill test is successful during an evasion attempt, you may automatically evade another enemy at your location.

name: British Bull Dog
text: Uses (3 ammo). [action] Spend 1 ammo: Fight. You may use [agility] instead of [combat] for this attack and you get +2 skill value. This attack deals +1 damage. Ignore the aloof keyword for this attack. [reaction] After you fail a skill test while parleying with an enemy: Put British Bull Dog into play from your hand.

flavor: "I shouldn't be telling you this, but since you seem trustworthy..."
name: Snitch
text:
Fast. Play after you succeed at a skill test while parleying.
Discover 2 total clues from among your location and connecting locations.

name: Bewitching
text:
Permanent. Exceptional.
[reaction] Before you draw your opening hand: Search your deck for up to 3 different Trick cards, and attach them facedown to Bewitching. Shuffle your deck.
[reaction] When you engage an enemy, exhaust Bewitching: Either draw 1 attached card, or search the top 9 cards of your deck for a copy of an attached card, draw it, and shuffle your deck.

name: Dirty Deeds
text: As an additional cost to play Dirty Deeds, spend an action. Search your deck for an [[Illicit]] asset and play it, paying its cost. Then, you may resolve an [action] or [fast] ability on that asset, ignoring all costs (including its [action] cost, if any). Playing this card does not provoke attacks of opportunity.

name: Vamp
text: Parley. Choose an enemy at your location and test any number of skills. One at a time, in any order, test each chosen skill (2). For each test you succeeded, if it was... - ...[willpower], remove 1 doom from that enemy. - ...[intellect], discover 1 clue at your location. - ...[agility], automatically evade that enemy. Move it to a connecting location if it is non-[[Élite]]. - ...[combat], deal 2 damage to that enemy.

name: Fake Credentials
text: [action] Choose an enemy at your location: Parley. Test [intellect](0). This test gets +1 difficulty for each suspicion on Fake Credentials. If you succeed, discover 1 clue at your location or a connecting location. If you did not succeed by 2 or more, place 1 resource on Fake Credentials, as suspicion. If you fail, return Fake Credentials to your hand.

flavor: "...and I heard he called you stupid too!"
name: Stir the Pot
text: Parley. Choose an enemy at your location and test [intellect] (X), where X is the chosen enemy's combined damage/horror values. If you succeed, deal X damage to each enemy at your location. After this effect resolves, you may disengage from each enemy and move to a connecting location.

name: Cat Mask
text:
Limit 1 [[Mask]] per investigator.
Uses (2 offerings). Replenish 2 of these offerings after doom is placed on a card with no doom.
[fast] Spend 1 offering: You get +2 [willpower] or +2 [combat] for this skill test. (Limit once per test.)

name: Rod of Carnamagos
text:
Limit 1 per deck.
[fast] Choose a non-[[Élite]] enemy at any location and exhaust Rod of Carnamagos: Reveal 5 random chaos tokens from the chaos bag. If a [curse] token is revealed, search your bonded cards for a random [[Rot]] event and attach it to that enemy.

name: Abyssal Rot
text: Bonded (Rod of Carnamagos) Attached enemy cannot attack. Forced - When attached enemy leaves play: Set Abyssal Rot aside, out of play.

name: Aember Rot
text: Bonded (Rod of Carnamagos) Forced - When attached enemy is defeated: Gain resources equal to its printed health (to a maximum of 5). Forced - When attached enemy leaves play: Set Aember Rot aside, out of play.

name: Putrescent Rot
text: Bonded (Rod of Carnamagos) Attached enemy gets -1 fight and -1 evade. Forced - When attached enemy leaves play: Set Putrescent Rot aside, out of play.

name: Scarlet Rot
text: Bonded (Rod of Carnamagos) Forced - At the end of the round: Attached enemy takes 1 damage. Forced - When attached enemy leaves play: Set Scarlet Rot aside, out of play.

name: Virescent Rot
text: Bonded (Rod of Carnamagos) Attached enemy cannot move. Forced - When attached enemy leaves play: Set Virescent Rot aside, out of play.

name: Speak to the Dead
text: Uses (6 offerings). [action] Spend any number of offerings: Parley. Choose a [[Spell]] or [[Ritual]] event in your discard pile and reveal tokens from the chaos bag equal to the number of offerings spent. If at least 1 [skull] or [curse] token was revealed, return the chosen event to your hand.

name: Wicked Athame
text: [action] Add 1-3 [curse] tokens to the chaos bag: Fight. You get +2 [combat] for this attack for each [curse] token added as part of this action's cost. If this attack defeats an enemy, replenish 1 charge or offering on an asset you control.

name: Antediluvian Hymn
text:
As an additional cost to play Antediluvian Hymn, spend an action.
Reveal the top 5 cards of the encounter deck. For each card revealed, you may add 1 [curse] token to the chaos bag to place that card on the bottom of the encounter deck. Return the rest to the top of the encounter deck in any order.

flavor: What was yours is now mine.
name: Drain Essence
text: Parley. Choose an enemy at your location and test [willpower](X), where X is the chosen enemy's fight value. If you succeed, move 1 damage from your investigator to the chosen enemy (up to 2 damage instead if the chosen enemy is non-[[Élite]]).

flavor: Not all who wander are lost.
name: Accursed
text: When you commit Accursed to a skill test, add up to 3 [curse] tokens to the chaos bag. During this skill test, treat the modifier of each [curse] token revealed as 0.

flavor: The dreaming mind is as deep as any sea.
name: Mesmeric Influence
text: While this card is committed to a skill test, the performing investigator may ignore all keyword or location effects that would trigger during this test.

flavor: You must invest yourself in every spell. Sometimes literally.
name: Olive McBride
text: [reaction] When you would reveal a chaos token, exhaust Olive McBride: Reveal 4 chaos tokens instead of 1. Choose 2 of those tokens to resolve, and ignore the rest.

name: Rod of Carnamagos
text:
Limit 1 per deck.
[fast] Choose a non-[[Élite]] enemy at any location and exhaust Rod of Carnamagos: Reveal 5 random chaos tokens from the chaos bag. For each [curse] token revealed, you may search your bonded cards for a [[Rot]] event and attach it to that enemy.

name: Call the Beyond
text:
As an additional cost to play Call the Beyond, add 3 [curse] tokens to the chaos bag.
Choose an asset vou control with "uses (charges)" or "uses (secrets)". Replenish all of that asset's charges or secrets. Then, you may resolve an [action] or [fast] ability on that asset without paying its [action] cost, if any.

name: Ethereal Form
text: Evade. Add your [willpower] value to your skill value for this evasion attempt. If you succeed, disengage from each other enemy engaged with you, and for the remainder of the round, you are ethereal (enemies cannot engage or be engaged with you, and you cannot attack or deal damage to enemies). If a symbol was revealed during this evasion attempt, return Ethereal Form to your hand at the end of your turn.

name: Read the Signs
text: Investigate. Add your [willpower] value to your skill value for this investigation. You may ignore any effect or keyword on your location which would trigger during this investigation. If you succeed, discover 1 additional clue at this location. If a symbol was revealed during this investigation, return Read the Signs to your hand at the end of your turn.

name: Spectral Razor
text: Fight. Add your [willpower] value to your skill value for this attack. Immediately before this attack, you may engage the attacked enemy. This attack deals + 1 damage (+2 damage instead if the enemy is non-[[Élite]]). If a symbol was revealed during this attack, return Spectral Razor to your hand at the end of your turn.

name: Ethereal Weaving
text:
As an additional cost to play Ethereal Weaving, spend an action.
Reveal up to 3 different [[Spell]] events from your hand. One at a time, play each revealed event, reducing its cost by 1. While resolving each of these events, you get +2 skill value.

name: The Key of Solomon
text:
[fast] If there are more [bless] than [curse] tokens in the chaos bag, remove 1 [bless] token from the chaos bag and exhaust The Key of Solomon: Heal up to 2 damage and/or horror from an investigator or [[Ally]] asset at your location.
[fast] If there are more [curse] than [bless] tokens in the chaos bag, remove 1 [curse] token from the chaos bag and exhaust The Key of Solomon: Gain 2 resources.

name: Seal of the Elders
text:
Fast. Play after a skill test at your location ends in which at least 2 [curse] tokens or 2 [bless] tokens were revealed.
If 2 [curse] tokens were revealed, search your bonded cards for 1 copy of Servant of Brass and put it into play. If 2 [bless] tokens were revealed, search your bonded cards for Keeper of the Key and put it into play. If 2 [curse] tokens and 2 [bless] tokens were revealed, do both instead. Remove Seal of the Elders from the game.

name: Keeper of the Key
text: Bonded (Seal of the Elders). [reaction] When a [bless] token is revealed during a skill test at your location: Deal 1 damage to Servant of Brass and 2 damage to an enemy at your location or a connecting location. Forced - When Servant of Brass would leave play: Set it aside, out of play.

name: Servant of Brass
text: Bonded (Seal of the Elders). [reaction] When a [curse] token is revealed during a skill test at your location: Deal 1 damage to Servant of Brass and 2 damage to an enemy at your location or a connecting location. Forced - When Servant of Brass would leave play: Set it aside, out of play.

name: Matchbox
text:
Uses (3 supplies). If Matchbox has no supplies, discard it.
[fast] During any investigator's turn, exhaust Matchbox and spend 1 supply: Your location gets -1 shroud until the end of this turn.

name: Pelt Shipment
text:
While Pelt Shipment is in your hand, your maximum hand size is reduced by 3.
[reaction] When the game ends or you resign, if Pelt Shipment is in your hand: Reduce the experience cost of the next new card you purchase before the next scenario by 1.

name: Pitchfork
text: [action]: Fight. You get +1 [combat] and deal +2 damage for this attack. If this attack is successful, lose control of Pitchfork and attach it to your location. Your location gains: "[action]: Take control of Pitchfork. Any investigator at Pitchfork's location may trigger this ability."

name: Sparrow Mask
text:
Limit 1 [[Mask]] per investigator.
Uses (2 offerings). Replenish 1 of these offerings after you take 1 or more damage and/or horror.
[fast] Spend 1 offering: You get +2 [willpower] or +2 [agility] for this skill test. (Limit once per test.)

name: Elaborate Distraction
text:
As an additional cost to play Elaborate Distraction, spend an action. Playing Elaborate Distraction does not provoke attacks of opportunity.
For each enemy at your location and at each connecting location (choose one):
- Automatically evade that enemy if it is non-[[Élite]].
- Deal 1 damage to that enemy.

name: Pushed to the Limit
text: Choose a [[Weapon]] or [[Herramienta]] asset in your discard pile. Resolve an [action] ability on that asset, ignoring all costs (including its [action] cost). After this effect resolves, shuffle the chosen asset into your deck. Playing this card does not provoke attacks of opportunity.

name: Stall for Time
text: Parley. Choose an enemy at your location. Test [willpower] (X), where X is the chosen enemy's fight or evade value, whichever is lower. If you succeed, exhaust the chosen enemy (but do not disengage from it). If it is non-[[Élite]], it does not ready during the next upkeep phase. If you fail, return Stall for Time to your hand.

name: Wrong Place, Right Time
text:
As an additional cost to play Wrong Place, Right Time, spend an action.
Move up to 5 damage and/or horror from your investigator to assets controlled by investigators at your location. For each asset defeated by this effect, draw 1 card. Remove Wrong Place, Right Time from the game.

name: Long Shot
text:
You may commit Long Shot to a fight or evasion test against an enemy at your location or a connecting location.
If this test is successful, deal 1 damage to that enemy.

name: Hatchet
text: [action]: Fight. Add your [agility] to your skill value for this attack. This attack deals +1 damage. If this attack defeats an enemy, discard Hatchet. Otherwise, lose control of Hatchet and attach it to the attacked enemy. Attached enemy gains: "[reaction] When attached enemy is defeated: Take control of Hatchet. Any investigator at Hatchet's location may trigger this ability."

flavor: "Anyone but a stolid famer would have fainted or gone mad..." - H.P. Lovecraft, <u>The Colour Out of Space</u>
name: Persistence
text: You may commit Persistence to a skill test from your discard pile. If you do, shuffle it into your deck after this test ends.

flavor: I will guide thy hand.
name: Devil
text: Forced - When your turn begins: Move 1 damage from your investigator to "Devil" Forced - When "Devil" is defeated: Deal 2 damage to each enemy and investigator at your location.

name: Fire Axe
text: Fast. [action]: Fight. If you have no resources in your resource pool, this attack deals +1 damage. [free] During an attack using Fire Axe, spend 1 resource: You get +2 [combat] for this skill test. (Limit three times per attack.)

name: Hunting Jacket
text:
[fast] Exhaust Hunting Jacket: Choose 1 non-weakness card in your hand and attach it facedown to Hunting Jacket (max 3 cards attached). Then, gain 1 resource for each attached card.
[reaction] When Hunting Jacket is defeated: Draw each attached card.

name: Mariner's Compass
text: [action] Exhaust Mariner's Compass: Investigate. If you fail, ready Mariner's Compass. If you succeed and have no resources in your resource pool, discover 1 additional clue at your location. [fast] During an investigation using Mariner's Compass, spend 1 resource: You get +1 [intellect] for this skill test. (Limit three times per investigation.)

name: Survival Technique
text:
[fast] Choose a card you own that is attached to your location and exhaust Survival Technique: Add that card to your hand.
[fast] During a skill test on a location or on a treachery attached to your location, exhaust Survival Technique: You get +2 skill value for this test.

flavor: Those who walk in faith need not fear the dark.
name: Keep Faith
text:
Fast. Play during any [fast] window.
Add 4 [bless] tokens to the chaos bag.

flavor: Courage is your best defense against whatever horrors lurk beyond.
name: Providential
text: If this skill test is successful, add 1 [bless] token to the chaos bag for each damage or horror on you (whichever is less).

name: Token of Faith
text: [reaction] After a skill test ends in which 1 or more [curse] or [auto_fail] tokens were revealed, exhaust Token of Faith: Add that many [bless] tokens to the chaos bag. If this skill test failed, after resolving all effects from the failed test, the performing investigator may attempt that test again. (Max once per test.)

name: Dark Horse
text:
Permanent. Limit 1 per deck.
During the upkeep phase, you may choose to not gain resources.
While you have no resources in your resource pool, you get +1 [willpower], +1 [intellect], +1 [combat], and +1 [agility].

name: Eldritch Tongue
text:
Uses (4 charges).
You may play events with "parley" from your discard pile as if they were in your hand. As an additional cost to play an event this way, spend 1 charge from Eldritch Tongue. After that event resolves, remove it from the game.

flavor: It's half past midnight, and you're starting to wonder if the whole thing's a ruse.
name: Bide Your Time
text:
As an additional cost to play Bide Your Time, spend an action.
During your next turn, you may take two additional actions.

flavor: The fine clothes do all the talking.
name: Well-Dressed
text: While Well-Dressed is committed to a skill test during a parley action, it gains [wild] [wild] [wild].

flavor: Only the strongest spirit can sunder the dark.
name: Dawn Star
text:
Fast. Play after revealing chaos tokens during a skill test at your location.
Ignore the modifiers of each [curse] token revealed during this test. For each [curse] token ignored, deal 1 damage to an enemy at your location.

flavor: "The price is but a pittance for what you will gain."
name: Occult Reliquary
text:
Permanent. Limit 1 per deck.
You have 1 additional hand, accessory, or arcane slot, which can only be used to hold a [[Blessed]] or [[Cursed]] asset.

name: Broken Diadem
text:
Limit 1 per deck. Limit 1 [[Mask]] per investigator.
[reaction] After a skill test at your location ends in which both a [bless] and [curse] token were revealed: Place 1 resource on this card, as an offering. Then, if there are 3 offerings on this card, search your bonded cards for Twilight Diadem and swap it with this card, moving all offerings from this card to Twilight Diadem.

name: Twilight Diadem
text:
Bonded (Broken Diadem). Limit 1 [[Mask]] per investigator.
[reaction] When you reveal either a [bless] or [curse] token during a skill test, spend 1 offering and exhaust this card: Treat the revealed token as an [elder_sign] token instead, returning it to the chaos bag. Then, if this card has no offerings, search your bonded cards for Broken Diadem and swap it with this card.

name: Maimed Hand
text: Revelation - You must either put Maimed Hand into play in your threat area, or take 1 damage and shuffle it into your deck. It cannot leave play except by the [action] [action] ability below. You get -1 health. [action] [action]: Discard Maimed Hand.

name: Back Injury
text: Revelation - You must either put Back Injury into play in your threat area, or take 1 damage and shuffle it into your deck. It cannot leave play except by the [action] [action] ability below. You get -1 health. [action] [action]: Discard Back Injury.

name: The Silver Moth
text: Revelation - You must either put The Silver Moth into play in your threat area, or take 1 horror and shuffle it into your deck. It cannot leave play except by the [action] [action] ability below. You get -1 sanity. [action] [action]: Discard The Silver Moth.

name: Vow of Drzytelech
text: Revelation - You must either put Vow of Drzytelech into play in your threat area, or take 1 horror and shuffle it into your deck. It cannot leave play except by the [action] [action] ability below. You get -1 sanity. [action] [action]: Discard Vow of Drzytelech.
